intro:
Welcome to Bharat Nivesh Yatra:
An ‘On-the-Wheels' initiative to create awareness about Mutual Funds.
We are here to take you on a journey to explore the world of Mutual Funds and help you understand the importance of investing for your goals.
video-1: You can start this tour by understanding what Mutual Funds are.
video-2: Now that you know what Mutual Funds are, let us understand why investing is more beneficial than just saving.
video-3: You can begin your investment journey through a Systematic Investment Plan (SIP). But what exactly is a SIP?
video-4: Let us understand how SIPs can help you reach your financial goals even with as little as ₹500 a month.
start-planning-main-heading: Now that you know how a small SIP can help you meet big goals, let us understand why goal planning is important
start-planning-main-paragraph: Goal planning helps you focus your investments on specific financial goals, like buying a house or saving for retirement and plan for them well in time. Starting early will make your money work harder towards meaningful goals and help you track progress over time.
Goals-page-heading:
Goals:
Now let us take the first step towards meeting your goals with SIP in Mutual Funds.
Dream Home: Step closer to your dream home
Dream Vacation: Plan for your dream getaway and make it a reality.
Luxury Car: Gear up to own your dream car.
Child's Future: Plan the best for your child’s future.
Retirement: Plan today for a stress-free retirement
thank-you-heading:
Thank you for giving us your time!
We hope we helped you come one step closer towards your investment journey.
thank-you-msg: Your personalised plan is on its way to your inbox.
goal-headline: Determine the monthly SIP investments you need to make to reach a particular goal.
foot-note: Past performance may or may not be sustained in future and is not a guarantee of any future returns.Please note that these calculators are for illustrations only and do not represent actual returns.Mutual Funds do not have a fixed rate of return and it is not possible to predict the rate of return.Mutual Fund investments are subject to market risks, read all scheme related documents carefully.
dream-home-tag-line: An SIP of $SIPAMOUNT$ each month, over the next $INVESTYEAR$ years, can help you move closer to your goal of owning a home worth $GOALAMOUNT$.
luxury-car-tag-line: An SIP of $SIPAMOUNT$ each month, over the next $INVESTYEAR$ years, can help you move closer to your goal of owning a luxury car worth $GOALAMOUNT$.
dream-vacation-tag-line: An SIP of $SIPAMOUNT$ each month, over the next $INVESTYEAR$ years, can help you move closer to your goal of going on that dream vacation worth $GOALAMOUNT$.
child-future-tag-line: An SIP of $SIPAMOUNT$ each month, over the next $INVESTYEAR$ years, can help you move closer to your goal of $GOALAMOUNT$ for your children’s future.
wedding-tag-line: An SIP of $SIPAMOUNT$ each month, over the next $INVESTYEAR$ years, can help you move closer to your goal of $GOALAMOUNT$ for your dream wedding.
retire-tag-line: An SIP of $SIPAMOUNT$ each month, over the next $INVESTYEAR$ years, can help you move closer to your goal of $GOALAMOUNT$ for your dream retirement.
disclaimer-text: Mutual Fund investments are subject to market risks, read all scheme related documents carefully.
